ISSUE.TITLE: Missing filtering logic in M2M
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Please enter the following details** "Search Records" field not working at all **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create a M2M column 2. Click '+' to add a record 3. Type a primary name (e.g. Australia) in Search records 4.
